Grimlock kept racing forward, hoping to run straight underneath the
Grenade. He wasnt really paying attention to it, he just wanted to snap
his jaws around the punk. So he lunged. 

OOC: Cyberwolf, you can say if the grenade hits me, or if the radius
does.
